entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 12:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 34 with temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow late this morning. Blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 34 with temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 57 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
